title: Public Records Request for Bodycam Footage, Dashcam, and Incident Reports – Arrest of Unnamed 24-Year-Old Mother (March 30, 2023)

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Texas Public Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

I respectfully request access to the following records related to the March 30, 2023, arrest of an unnamed 24-year-old female suspect at approximately 3:45 PM at Matlock Ave. & N. 8th St., Aransas Pass, TX. This request is related to the incident involving a school bus where the suspect allegedly blocked the vehicle, resisted officers, and was tased:

3/30/2023, around 3:45 pm, officers were sent to W. Matlock and N. 8th Street for a vehicle blocking the pathway of an APISD school bus. While officers were on their way, the information updated to state a female pedestrian was standing in front of the school bus preventing it from continuing its route. The bus was occupied by several students under the age of 17 and two adult employees of the ISD.  

EVENT #23-7398, UNLAWFUL RESTRAINT – SCHOOL BUS

Body-worn camera footage from all responding officers involved in the arrest.
Incident reports and arrest reports regarding this case.
Dashcam footage from any patrol units that responded to the scene.
Rear-seat police vehicle footage (if applicable) from the unit that transported the suspect following her arrest.
This request seeks essential records documenting the suspect’s alleged unlawful restraint of the bus, resistance to arrest, and harassment of an officer (spitting on police). If any 911 calls or additional footage (such as school bus surveillance) exist, I request them only if they provide additional relevant details.

Fee Waiver Request
I request a waiver of all fees as the release of these records serves the public interest by contributing to transparency in law enforcement actions and public safety matters, rather than for personal or commercial gain.

Please provide these records in digital format via email or through a secure online portal if available. If any associated costs apply, please notify me before processing. If any portion of this request is denied or redacted, please cite the specific legal exemption under Texas law that justifies the denial.

Thank you for your time and assistance. Please confirm receipt of this request at your earliest convenience.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Police Cam News

title: Public Records Request for Bodycam Footage and Incident Reports – Arrest of Martin Jose Alvarez (Jan. 19, 2022)

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Florida Sunshine Law, I hereby request the following records:

I respectfully request access to the following records related to the arrest of Martin Jose Alvarez, which occurred on January 19, 2022, at approximately 12:30 AM at the Waffle House located at 1808 Del Prado Blvd, Cape Coral, FL:

Body-worn camera footage from all Cape Coral Police Department officers who responded to the incident and interacted with or arrested Martin Jose Alvarez.
Incident report(s) and arrest report(s) generated by Cape Coral Police Department concerning this case.
Rear-seat police vehicle footage (if applicable) from the patrol unit that transported Mr. Alvarez following his arrest.
This request is focused on essential records documenting the incident, including Mr. Alvarez's alleged disorderly conduct, his interactions with officers, and the actions taken by law enforcement. If any 911 calls or additional footage (such as surveillance) exist, I request them only if they provide significant additional context to the event.

Fee Waiver Request
I request a waiver of all fees for this request as the disclosure of the information sought is not primarily in my commercial interest and is likely to contribute significantly to public understanding of law enforcement actions, making the disclosure a matter of public interest.

Please provide these records in digital format via email or through a secure online portal if available. If there are any associated costs, please inform me before processing. If any portion of this request is denied or redacted, please cite the specific exemption under Florida law that justifies the denial.

Thank you for your attention to this matter. Please confirm receipt of this request at your earliest convenience.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days.

Sincerely,

Police Cam News

To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the New York Freedom of Information Law, I hereby request the following records:

1) All contracts, licenses, MOUs, MOAs, data agreements, letters of intent, State of Work documents, Scope of Work documents, and other agreement documents since Jan. 1, 2021 between New York State Police and Global Intelligence Inc. (also called Cybercheck or Cybercheck.AI) for the provision of the Cybercheck service (excluding any already undisclosed via previous FOIAs).

2) All email exchanges, including attachments, between New York State Police staff and email addresses with the domain "@cybercheck.ai" between Jan. 1, 2021 and the present (excluding any already undisclosed via previous FOIAs).

3) All emails, including attachments, between staff of New York State Police that reference Cybercheck or its provider Global Intelligence, sent between Jan. 1, 2021 and the present.

I request that you waive all fees as I am a journalist and the requested records will be used for journalism in the public interest.

If you choose to impose fees, I request a detailed breakdown of the fees, including the hourly wage of each employee involved and an explanation of the employee hours required to fulfil the request.

If you choose to reject this request or redact portions of responsive documents, I ask that you provide a detailed breakdown of the statutory exemptions and associated case law underlying your decision to withhold each/any portions from public review.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Jessica Hatcher

title: Public Records Request for Dashcam Footage and Incident Reports – Arrest of Acklynn Byamugisha (May 20, 2024)

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Florida Sunshine Law, I hereby request the following records:

I respectfully request access to the following records related to the arrest of Acklynn Byamugisha, which occurred on May 20, 2024, in the afternoon on the MacArthur Causeway, Miami, FL:

Dashcam footage from all Florida Highway Patrol (FHP) vehicles that responded to the incident involving Ms. Byamugisha.
Incident reports and arrest reports generated by FHP concerning this case.
Rear-seat vehicle footage (if applicable) from the patrol unit that transported Ms. Byamugisha following her arrest.
This request focuses on essential records that document the incident, including the initial traffic accident, subsequent altercation, and interactions between Ms. Byamugisha and the responding officers. If any 911 calls or additional footage (such as surveillance) exist, I request them only if they provide significant additional context to the events.

Here's a news link: https://www.local10.com/news/local/2024/05/31/new-footage-shows-arrest-of-woman-in-bizarre-macarthur-causeway-attack/#:~:text=MIAMI%20%E2%80%93%20Authorities%20released%20dashcam,crash%20on%20the%20MacArthur%20Causeway

Fee Waiver Request
I request a waiver of all fees for this request as the disclosure of the information sought is not primarily in my commercial interest and is likely to contribute significantly to public understanding of the operations or activities of the government, making the disclosure a matter of public interest.

Please provide these records in digital format via email or through a secure online portal if available. If there are any associated costs, please inform me before processing. If any portion of this request is denied or redacted, please cite the specific exemption under Florida law that justifies the denial.

Thank you for your attention to this matter. Please confirm receipt of this request at your earliest convenience.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days.

Sincerely,

Police Cam News

title: Public Records Request for Bodycam Footage, Surveillance Video, and Incident Reports – Arrest of Gail Randolph

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Ohio Open Records Law, I hereby request the following records:

I request access to the following records related to the arrest of Gail Randolph (DOB: [if available]), which occurred in March 2025 during the evening at a restaurant in Youngstown, OH (Mahoning County):

Here;'s a news link
https://www.wkbn.com/news/local-news/youngstown-news/youngstown-police-say-woman-who-refused-to-pay-restaurant-bill-spit-on-officer/
Body-worn camera footage from all officers involved in the response, interaction, and arrest of Gail Randolph.
Incident report(s) and arrest report(s) related to this case.
Surveillance footage from the restaurant or any business cameras obtained or reviewed by law enforcement documenting the incident.
Rear-seat police vehicle footage (if applicable) from the unit that transported Ms. Randolph following her arrest.

As this incident took place inside a business, surveillance footage is necessary for documenting Ms. Randolph’s alleged refusal to pay and the escalation that led to her arrest. If any 911 calls exist, I request them only if they provide relevant additional details.

Fee Waiver Request
I request a fee waiver as the disclosure of these records serves the public interest in transparency regarding law enforcement interactions and public disturbances, rather than for personal or commercial gain.

Please provide these records in digital format via email or a secure online portal if available. If any associated fees apply, please inform me before processing. If any portion of this request is denied or redacted, please cite the specific exemption under Ohio law.

Thank you for your time and assistance. Please confirm receipt of this request at your earliest convenience.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days.

Sincerely,

Police Cam News

title: Public Records Request for Bodycam Footage, Dashcam, and Reports – Arrest of Domanie Chandon Roberts (07/30/2023)

communications.subject: Georgia Open Records Act Request: Public Records Request for Bodycam Footage, Dashcam, and Reports – Arrest of Domanie Chandon Roberts (07/30/2023)
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Georgia Open Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

I request access to the following records related to the arrest of Domanie Chandon Roberts, 40 at the time, which occurred on July 30, 2023, at approximately 10:13 PM in the 600 block of Vallotton Dr., Valdosta, GA:

Body-worn camera footage from all officers involved in the traffic stop, physical altercation, and arrest of Domanie Chandon Roberts.
Incident report(s) and arrest report(s) related to this case (Report #23-7398).
Dashcam footage from any patrol units that conducted the traffic stop or were involved in the response.
Rear-seat police vehicle footage (if applicable) from the unit that transported Mr. Roberts following his arrest.
This request is focused on essential records that document the escalation of a routine traffic stop into a physical confrontation. If any 911 calls or additional footage (such as surveillance) exist, I request them only if they provide significant additional context to the events.

Fee Waiver Request
I request a fee waiver as the release of these records serves the public interest by providing transparency regarding law enforcement actions and the use of force.

Please provide these records in digital format via email or a secure online portal if available. If any associated fees apply, please inform me before processing. If any portion of this request is denied or redacted, please cite the specific exemption under Georgia law.

Thank you for your time and assistance. Please confirm receipt of this request at your earliest convenience.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 3 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Police Cam News

title: Public Records Request for Bodycam Footage, Surveillance Video, Incident Reports, and Dashcam – Arrest of Elizar Ravelo (08/25/2023)

communications.subject: Florida Sunshine Law Request: Public Records Request for Bodycam Footage, Surveillance Video, Incident Reports, and Dashcam – Arrest of Elizar Ravelo (08/25/2023)
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Florida Sunshine Law, I hereby request the following records:

I request access to the following records related to the arrest of Elizar Ravelo, 64, which occurred on August 25, 2023, in the morning at the McDonald's drive-thru, 4999 NW 36th St, Miami Springs, FL:

Body-worn camera footage from all officers involved in the response, investigation, or arrest of Elizar Ravelo.
Incident report(s) and arrest report(s) documenting this case.
Surveillance footage from McDonald’s or any business cameras obtained or reviewed by law enforcement regarding the incident.
In-car (dashcam) video from any patrol units that responded or were involved in transporting Mr. Ravelo.
Rear-seat police vehicle footage (if applicable) from the unit that transported Mr. Ravelo after his arrest.
As this incident occurred in a fast-food establishment with security cameras, surveillance footage is necessary for documenting the altercation and confirming the sequence of events. If any 911 calls exist, I request them only if they provide additional relevant details.

Fee Waiver Request
I request a fee waiver as the disclosure of these records serves the public interest in ensuring transparency in law enforcement actions and documenting public safety incidents, rather than for personal or commercial gain.

Please provide these records in digital format via email or a secure online portal if available. If any costs apply, please notify me before processing. If any portion of this request is denied or redacted, please cite the specific exemption under Florida law.

Thank you for your time and assistance. Please confirm receipt of this request at your earliest convenience.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days.

Sincerely,

Police Cam News
